did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Daybook of unidentified mill in Weaversville (Fauquier County), Virginia, recording customer names and transactions.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Weaversville, Virginia Mill Daybook must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Weaversville, Virginia Mill Daybook, Ms2017-023, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Weaversville, Virginia Mill Daybook was acquired by Special Collections prior to 1943.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing and description of the Weaversville, Virginia Mill Daybook commenced and was completed in August, 2017.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a single daybook maintained by an unidentified mill in Weaversville (Fauquier County), Virginia during the late 19th century. The book contains brief entries listing customer names and transactions in chronological order, commencing on February 11, 1871 and continuing through April 1, 1872.

odd.head: General
odd.p: The daybook was rebound by Roanoke Printing Company in 1942. Information that may have helped in further identifying the mill may have been lost in the process.
